metadata.title: osmanthus
metadata.description: osmanthus-next.js is a template for building a website with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

login.title: Login
login.loginFailedMsg: Login failed, Please check your email and password
login.loginErrMsg: Please enter your email and password
login.noActivate: Account not activated, please check your email to activate your account

register.registerSuccessDescription: Register success, please check your email to activate your account
register.registerSuccessMsg: Register success, please check your email to activate your account

activate.activateLinkExpires: The activation link has expired, please resend the activation email

activateEmail.emailContent2: Create a process. We want to make sure it's really you. Please click the button below to activate. If you don't want to activate your account, you can ignore this message.
activateEmail.emailButton: Click here to activate your account
activateEmail.emailFooter: The Web Service will never send you an email asking you to disclose or verify your password, credit card or bank account number. If you have any questions, please contact us.

forgotPassword.forgotPasswordDescription: Please enter your email address, we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.sendSuccessDescription: We have sent an email to your email address, please check your email.

forgotPasswordEmail.emailContent2: You have requested to reset your password. Please click the button below to reset your password. If you don't want to reset your password, you can ignore this message.
forgotPasswordEmail.emailButton: Click here to reset your password
forgotPasswordEmail.emailFooter: The Web Service will never send you an email asking you to disclose or verify your password, credit card or bank account number. If you have any questions, please contact us

resetPassword.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Reset password success, please login with your new password
resetPassword.resetPasswordFailedDescription: Reset password failed, please try again
resetPassword.activateLinkExpires: The reset password link has expired, please resend the reset password email

home.title: Welcome
home.description: osmanthus-next.js is a template for building a website with Next.js and Tailwind CSS
home.advantagesDescription: osmanthus can help you quickly build your next.js App

rapid.title: Rapid Development
rapid.description: Next.js is known for its fast server-side rendering and static site generation capabilities, making the development process faster and more efficient.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Tailwind CSS offers a plethora of utility classes, making the design of responsive layouts simple and quick, without the need to write complex CSS code.

components.title: Component-based Architecture
components.description: The Osmanthus template uses a component-based design, making the code more modular, easy to maintain, and scalable.

customize.title: Customizable Styles
customize.description: With the powerful configuration capabilities of Tailwind CSS, you can easily customize the website's theme and styles to meet brand requirements.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Next.js supports server-side rendering, which helps improve the SEO performance of the website, ensuring that the content is better presented in search engines.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Next.js offers features such as code splitting and lazy loading, combined with the lightweight framework of Tailwind CSS, can significantly enhance the website's loading speed and performance.
